info.title: Jentic Generated Arazzo Specification
info.description: Automatically generated Arazzo specification from OpenAPI

workflows.summary: Search for books based on a query, view details of a specific book, list the user's bookshelves, and add the chosen book to a selected bookshelf.
workflows.description: Search for books based on a query, view details of a specific book, list the user's bookshelves, and add the chosen book to a selected bookshelf.

steps.description: Search the Google Books catalog for volumes matching a query.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific volume identified by its ID.
Retrieve the list of bookshelves belonging to the authenticated user.
Add the selected volume to a specific bookshelf in the user's library.

workflows.summary: Retrieve the last known reading position for a specific volume and update it to a new position.
workflows.description: Retrieve the last known reading position for a specific volume and update it to a new position.

steps.description: Retrieve the user's current reading position for a given volume.
Update the user's reading position for the volume.

workflows.summary: Create a new annotation (e.g., highlight, note) for a volume and then retrieve the list of all annotations for that volume.
workflows.description: Create a new annotation (e.g., highlight, note) for a volume and then retrieve the list of all annotations for that volume.

steps.description: Insert a new annotation for a volume.
Retrieve a list of annotations for the specified volume.

workflows.summary: Fetch a list of recommended books for the user and allow the user to rate a specific recommendation (e.g., 'Not Interested').
workflows.description: Fetch a list of recommended books for the user and allow the user to rate a specific recommendation (e.g., 'Not Interested').

steps.description: Retrieve a list of recommended books for the authenticated user.
Submit a rating for a recommended volume to improve future suggestions.

workflows.summary: List volumes on a specific personal bookshelf and move a volume to a different position within that shelf.
workflows.description: List volumes on a specific personal bookshelf and move a volume to a different position within that shelf.

steps.description: Retrieve the list of volumes contained within a specific bookshelf.
Move a specific volume to a new position within the same bookshelf.

workflows.summary: Check the user's family sharing status and then initiate sharing a specific volume with their family group.
workflows.description: Check the user's family sharing status and then initiate sharing a specific volume with their family group.

steps.description: Retrieve information about the user's family group and their role/permissions.
Share a specified volume (by volumeId or docId) with the user's family.

workflows.summary: Retrieve details for a specific book, identify its series, fetch metadata for the series, and list all volumes belonging to that series.
workflows.description: Retrieve details for a specific book, identify its series, fetch metadata for the series, and list all volumes belonging to that series.

steps.description: Get details of a volume to extract its series information.
Retrieve metadata for the identified book series.
Retrieve the list of volumes that are part of the specified series.

workflows.summary: Upload a new book using cloud loading and then periodically check the list of user-uploaded books to monitor its processing status.
workflows.description: Upload a new book using cloud loading and then periodically check the list of user-uploaded books to monitor its processing status.

steps.description: Initiate the upload of a user-provided volume.
List user-uploaded volumes, potentially filtering by processing state or ID, to check the status.

workflows.summary: Request download access permission for a specific volume for offline reading, and later release that access when no longer needed.
workflows.description: Request download access permission for a specific volume for offline reading, and later release that access when no longer needed.

steps.description: Request concurrent and/or download access restrictions for a volume.
Release the download access restriction for one or more volumes.

workflows.summary: Retrieve the list of public bookshelves for a specified user ID and then list the volumes contained within one of those public shelves.
workflows.description: Retrieve the list of public bookshelves for a specified user ID and then list the volumes contained within one of those public shelves.

steps.description: Retrieve a list of public bookshelves for a given user ID.
Retrieve the volumes within a specific public bookshelf of the user.
